sub_title: Sim Driver || Business Support || BBA at the University of Amsterdam
summary:
My professional path has led me through diverse landscapes, from culinary environments to the logistical hub of the Netherlands, landing me at the analytical and operational nucleus of DSV. This journey, neither extraordinary nor mundane, has cultivated a skill set that balances the technical with the interpersonal, much like a well-orchestrated symphony.

At DSV, my purview isn't confined to mere oversight of KPI tracking tools or wrangling CargoWise One inquiries across the Netherlands. Instead, it encompasses the subtle art of transforming raw data into meaningful insights, a task that aligns with my intuitive nature and penchant for exploring hidden meanings and distant possibilities.

My background includes time at ManagAir, sharpening my expertise in operations management, and a stint as a driver for Amazon Netherlands. Each role has added a layer to my professional fabric, reflecting a conscientious approach that values fluid processes and effectiveness over bravado.

Outside the office, I'm captivated by racing, resonating with the sport's pursuit of perfection and originality. Whether it's the finesse of F1 or achievements in sim racing like clocking 6:50s Bridge to Gantry on the Ring with the 718 Cayman GT4 Clubsport, my flexibility and value for novelty shine through.

To encapsulate, I'm an amalgamation of varied experiences and a personality that's rich in intellect, adaptable, and eager to improve. My introverted nature doesn't hinder, but rather enhances my deep and meaningful connections with those I work with. I believe in precision, adaptability, and genuine passion without overstating my hand. If these attributes resonate with you, and you appreciate someone who strives for balance and subtlety in their professional life, I'd be pleased to connect.

education.degree_name: Bachelor of Business Administration - BSc BA

profile_positions.description:
KPI Tracking Tool Management: Much like a conductor guides an orchestra, I lead the creation, maintenance, and fine-tuning of tools that track Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) across the Netherlands. These aren't mere numbers; they're the heartbeat of our business, echoing our performance and guiding us towards our objectives with precision.

Business Support for CargoWise One: Serving as a point of contact for inquiries related to CargoWise One isn't simply about troubleshooting. It's about ensuring that this globally recognized logistics tool sings harmoniously across the Netherlands, unlocking its potential and allowing stakeholders to dance to its tune.

Support for Global RFQ Processes: When key account managers wade into the complex waters of global Request for Quotations (RFQs), I don't merely assist; I become a vital compass. Understanding the subtle notes of these bids, I help craft proposals that are competitive yet mindful, like a well-balanced piece of music.

Excel Management for Initiatives: With Excel as my instrument, I manage various project components, from data analysis to workflow mapping. It's not just about crunching numbers; it's a creative endeavor ensuring that our Excel-based tasks resonate with efficiency and accuracy.

Miscellaneous Tasks: Beyond these core responsibilities, I engage in a diverse range of activities. These aren't mere footnotes but essential undertones, adding depth and ensuring our operations flow smoothly and our clients experience a performance that's both satisfying and memorable.
profile_positions.title: Business Support Assistant

profile_positions.description:
During my internship at DSV, I undertook key responsibilities to enhance our operational efficiency:

Development of Reporting Tools: I designed specific tools for reporting, ensuring that data was presented clearly and accessibly for various stakeholders. Each tool was crafted to meet unique needs, enhancing clarity and efficiency.

Excel-based Tool for XML Generation: I created an Excel tool to simplify XML file generation, streamlining the process for both creation and upload. This not only made data management more efficient but also eradicated potential bottlenecks, driving smoother operations.
profile_positions.title: Business Operations Intern

profile_positions.description:
While working as a professional chauffeur for Priority Logistics, an official DSP for Amazon Netherlands, my journey covered more than 20,000km and over 200 days on the road. This experience has imbued me with:

Comprehensive Local Expertise: I know the Netherlands' roads like the back of my hand. From everyday routes to unexpected detours, my familiarity with local regulations enables smooth navigation, no matter the situation.

Commitment to Safety & Efficiency: Safety and efficiency are my co-pilots. I blend skill with regional knowledge to ensure top-notch service, satisfying both my employer and the end customers.

Reliability & Professionalism: My driving record is punctuated by punctuality and a steadfast commitment to safety. Unforeseen challenges? I meet them with calm professionalism, always keeping the satisfaction of my clients in the forefront.
profile_positions.title: Chauffeur

profile_positions.description:
While working with ManagAir, I played a pivotal role in ensuring seamless day-to-day operations:

Operational Oversight: My primary responsibility involved overseeing the daily operations, which covered an array of tasks from addressing special customer requests to coordinating their essential needs.

Customer Relations: In the forefront of customer support, I tackled issues promptly, ensuring that each situation was handled professionally. This often required adeptly de-escalating more challenging situations, ensuring every interaction was handled with care and positivity.

Scheduling & Coordination: I undertook the task of planning and scheduling our representatives, ensuring that each guest had a point of contact during their stay. Additionally, I coordinated closely with our cleaning and maintenance teams, ensuring that our properties were in top-notch condition for our guests.

In-house Platform Management: I became proficient with ManagAir's proprietary platform. This not only aided in streamlining operations but also provided a foundation to further enhance the overall guest experience. By leveraging this platform, I was able to ensure guests enjoyed a hassle-free and memorable stay with us.
profile_positions.title: Shift Manager

profile_positions.description:
In my role at ManagAir catering to short-term renters, especially from platforms like Airbnb, my duties were multifaceted:

Guest Relations: I was the primary point of contact for our guests. This meant not only welcoming them upon their arrival but also ensuring that their stay was comfortable from start to finish.

Issue Resolution: An integral part of my role involved addressing any apartment-related concerns. Whether it was a minor inconvenience or a more pressing matter, I took swift action to rectify the situation.

Escalation Protocols: For more complex issues beyond immediate resolution, I had a clear understanding of our internal escalation processes. I would ensure that concerns were directed to the right department or individual, guaranteeing timely and effective solutions for our guests.
profile_positions.title: Customer Care Representative

profile_positions.description:
As a Microsoft PowerApps Developer, my role encompassed the following key areas:

Custom Application Development: Using PowerApps, I specialize in designing and refining applications to closely match the unique specifications and preferences of our clients. This customization ensures the applications serve their exact requirements, leading to enhanced usability.

Digital Transformation Expertise: I pride myself on a consistent record of bringing business processes into the digital age. Utilizing the comprehensive Microsoft Office 365 suite, I've been able to successfully transition traditional business models and workflows into digitized, more efficient versions.

Solution-Oriented Approach: My technical acumen, coupled with a deep understanding of client needs, empowers me to conceive and introduce inventive solutions. These are not merely technical fixes but innovative strategies designed to make operations more streamlined and efficient, effectively bridging the gap between technical possibilities and business objectives.
profile_positions.title: PowerApps Developer and Constultant

profile_positions.description:
In my role as a cold kitchen cook, I developed and refined several crucial competencies, vital not just for the culinary world but also for diverse professional environments:

Ingredient Storage Optimization: One of the fundamental challenges in any commercial kitchen is the efficient use and storage of ingredients. I mastered the art of organizing and storing ingredients to ensure freshness, accessibility, and optimal use of space. This not only aids in maintaining the quality of dishes but also ensures a smoother workflow for the entire kitchen.

Precision & Time Management: In preparing ingredients and bases for the hot kitchen, meticulous attention to detail is vital. I perfected the balance between speed and accuracy, ensuring that every component I prepped met the highest standards of quality while adhering to strict timelines.

Italian Cuisine Expertise: I carry a strong foundation in Italian cuisine, understanding the subtleties and nuances that make these dishes stand out. This knowledge became pivotal in ensuring that even the simplest of ingredients sang with authenticity and flavor.

Aesthetics & Presentation: Beyond taste, the visual appeal of a dish plays an integral role in the dining experience. I pride myself on my ability to present dishes in ways that are both artistically pleasing and aligned with the essence of the dish.

Thriving Under Pressure: The bustling environment of a commercial kitchen demands resilience, adaptability, and a calm demeanor, all of which I have cultivated.

Drawing from these experiences, I'm enthusiastic about leveraging my refined skill set in new and challenging opportunities.
profile_positions.title: Cold Kitchen Cook
